product_overview: EduTraker is a SaaS platform designed to ensure educational continuity and administrative efficiency for institutions in crisis-affected regions. It facilitates educational productivity, communication, and data-driven decision-making through role-based access and comprehensive management of schools, staff, students, and academic progress.
core_goals: Provide secure, role-based user management enabling delegation and operational control.
Enable comprehensive academic progress tracking including attendance, grading, and personalized dashboards for students and guardians.
Facilitate effective communication among teachers, guardians, students, and administrators with notification and messaging features.
Deliver reporting, analytics, and evaluation tools for managers and administrators to monitor educational outcomes and staff performance.
Support content management for teachers to upload and organize lesson plans and learning resources.
Ensure system reliability, security, and accessibility with a modern web and PWA frontend supporting offline functionality.
Configure multi-tenant hierarchical organization of workstreams, schools, and users with appropriate system settings.
key_features: JWT-based authentication with distinct portal and workstream login/registration endpoints.
Role-based access control for users including Admins, Workstream Managers, School Managers, Teachers, Secretaries, Students, and Guardians.
Full CRUD management of users, workstreams, schools, academic years, classrooms, students, grades, enrollments, courses, secretaries, and staff evaluations.
Personalized dashboards for each user role showing relevant academic, attendance, and administrative information.
Tools for teachers to manage lesson plans, record attendance, assign grades, and upload course content.
Communication module enabling direct messaging and notifications among users regarding academic progress and school announcements.
Comprehensive reporting and statistics dashboards tailored to roles such as School Manager, Workstream Manager, and Admin.
Mobile PWA frontend with offline support and data synchronization to enhance usability in low-connectivity environments.
Support for secure, performant backend API leveraging Django REST Framework, MySQL, Redis cache, and cloud storage for unstructured data.
user_flow_summary: Users authenticate via JWT tokens through portal or workstream-specific login and registration APIs.
Admins manage Workstream Managers and have access to high-level analytics and user role management.
Workstream Managers create and manage Schools and assign School Managers, viewing aggregate reports across schools.
School Managers handle operational staff accounts, monitor departments, conduct staff evaluations, and view school-specific reports.
Teachers create lesson plans, track attendance, assign grades, communicate with students and guardians, and manage subject content.
Secretaries register students and guardians, link them, update student information, and generate basic reports.
Students access personalized dashboards displaying grades, attendance, assignments, and subject content.
Guardians monitor their child's progress, receive notifications, and communicate with teachers.
The system supports offline PWA functionality and synchronization with the backend once connectivity is available.
validation_criteria: All functional requirements from user management, academic progress, communication, reporting, and content modules are implemented and verified via user acceptance testing.
Role-based access controls must be strictly enforced with unauthorized access prevented.
Performance targets such as dashboard load times and concurrent user handling requirements are met.
Security standards including HTTPS enforcement, password hashing, and secure JWT usage are validated.
The PWA frontend demonstrates offline support and proper synchronization without data loss.
Comprehensive test coverage from unit to integration and system testing is achieved with documented test cases.
The system interfaces operate consistently across supported browsers and devices, ensuring usability and accessibility.
Data integrity is maintained throughout CRUD operations across the multi-tenant hierarchy of workstreams, schools, users, and academic entities.

features.name: Authentication
features.description: JWT-based authentication with portal and workstream login/registration

/api/portal/auth/login/.post: Portal user login. Returns nested 'tokens' object with 'access' and 'refresh'.

/api/portal/auth/register/.post: Portal user registration. Requires 'password_confirm' field matching 'password'.

/api/workstream/{workstream_id}/auth/log.post: Workstream user login. Returns nested 'tokens' object.

features.name: User Management
features.description: CRUD operations for users with role-based access

/api/users/create/.post: Create new user. Required: email, full_name, password, role (choices: student, teacher, secretary, manager_school, manager_workstream, guardian, admin, guest). Optional: work_stream (int), school (int), profile_data (dict).

/api/workstream/.post: Create workstream. Required: name, manager_id, max_user.

/api/manager/schools/create/.post: Create school. Required: school_name, work_stream_id. Optional: manager_id (must be MANAGER_SCHOOL).
